data.summary: Insufficient evidence to validate the requirement regarding loyalty access.
data.assessment: The exploratory step requires validation that loyalty customers receive earlier access (30 days vs 7 days). However, the evidence does not provide direct confirmation of this behavior. The linked use case mentions the requirement but lacks concrete API reads or persisted state checks to verify that loyalty customers indeed have 30 days of access compared to the standard 7 days.
gaps: No evidence confirming that loyalty customers receive 30 days of access.
